body_html:
@peterjc123 mine environment would be cp36, win10 64 bits and a maxwell (quadro m1000m). I checked this CI build which look to succeed: Environment: APPVEYOR_BUILD_WORKER_IMAGE=Visual Studio 2017, PYTHON_VERSION=3.6, TORCH_CUDA_ARCH_LIST=Maxwell
I do have Visual Studio Community 2015, is there a problem with that env ?
